[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/Headlines/Natha.png[/img][/align]

[color=#FFFFE0][b]Poll: Private Message Made Public for Deal Disputes[/b][/color]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has created a poll in the [color=#FFFFE0][b][url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=2]Rules, Announcements, News, and Feedback[/url][/b][/color] regarding the new implementation of making on-forum private messages public for deal disputes. [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] states "I have a way to make it so that a private message could be displayed public by either the sender or receiver.". Feel free to vote yes or no [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5358009][b]here[/b][/url].

[color=#FFFFE0][b]Pokémon GO Has It's Own Section[/b][/color]
As mentioned in our last edition, the Pokémon GO section has been booming with activity, [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] started a thread asking if the Pokémon GO section should have it's own forum or continue being a sub-forum. Feedback indicated that people would prefer the Pokémon GO section to have it's very own stand a lone section. [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has taken the feedback and since decided to give the popular Pokémon GO it's own section. This can be seen in the [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=80][b]HF Gamers Zone[/b][/url].

[color=#FFFFE0][b]Members Referred Removed from Profile View[/b][/color]
The profile view no longer shows the amount of members you have referred, or who you have referred. No announcements have been released, this was most likely to save resources on the forum, after all it isn't the most important feature.

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/NotableThreads.png[/img][/align]

[b][color=white][u]Announcement Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5352329][b]Pornographic Anime[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]There has always been a rule in terms of pornographic material. Lately some members have been posting hentai, or anime porn which is against the rules. Omni has made it very clear on what will happen to you if you break this rule.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5353901][b]Subforum or Main Forum?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#FF66FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Nothing serious with this announcement, but Omni has moved the Pokemon Go sub-forum into its very own main forum within the Game tab.

[b][color=white][u]Informational Threads[/u][/color][/b]

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5345999][b][Massive] Ultimate Spreading Guide[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2759618][color=#00AAFF][b]YayHar[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Great tutorial on how to spread your RAT by the member YayHar. This thread also includes some terminology for those unfamiliar with the topic.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5346682][b][Tutorial] All-in-one Thread Design Tutorial[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3077324][color=#00AAFF][b]That Guy Maxim[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Want to make your very own thread designs? Why not check out this awesome guide on how to do exactly that. Not only will you get a detailed guide on how to make a thread design, but resources are also included within the thread!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5356533][b]Levi's (kind of) efficient OSRS help desk (skilling, pvp and pvm)[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=492095][color=#99FF00][b]Levi[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Whether you are new or old, it is always nice to get some assistance in life. If you need help in OSRS, come check out Levi's Help Desk.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5355274][b]Ultimate Guide - Anonymity and Security[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3198050][color=#efefef][b]Sirental[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Everyone likes to have privacy, and when it comes to our personal information we are very alert on passwords, emails, and other potential accounts that may get hacked. Sirental has created a guide to help keep your anonymity online as well as secure yourself.

[b][color=white][u]Entertaining Threads[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5355702][b]What is your favorite pickup line?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2448029][color=#FFFFFF][b]Shopify[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color] Not all the time will pickup lines work, but come share yours our with the bros of Hack Forums!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5356494][b]What award(s) do you want?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2192831][color=#EFEFEF][b]Lrrr[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]If you were given the opportunity to receive any award, which one would that be? Choose wisely!

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5356504][b]Cold Vs. Hot Showers?[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3213947][color=#EFEFEF][b]Shooked[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Warm or cold shower #masterrace? Which do you prefer?

[b][color=white][u]Contests and Giveaways[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5354599][b][THE ORDER] 3p1c Upgrade Contest! [RANDOM][/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3145324][color=#EFEFEF][b]βlack[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Enter today for your chance to win an upgrade complementary of the member βlack.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5354539][b]10$ BTC giveaway for upgraded members[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3173149][color=#99FF00][b]Nøitpyrcne[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]This contest is for $10 BTC. If you need the cash this giveaway is just for you.

[b][color=white][u]Member Feedback Threads[/u][/color][/b]

No Feedback Threads this week.

[b][color=white][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/color][/b] 

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5352777][b]PSA: Stop Linking Illegal Streaming Sites[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=279955][color=#efefef][b]Happeh[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Please follow the instructions Happeh has included in this thread.

[color=#333333]---[/color][url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5353192][b]#savemarinajoyce[/b][/url] - [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2849820][color=#00AAFF][b]Wuss[/b][/color][/url]
[color=#333333]---[/color]Trending hashtag going around of a female youtuber who may have been kidnapped. Some believe it's all a hoax.

[color=#333333]---[/color][b][color=white][u]Note from Ari[/u][/color][/b] 
[color=#333333]---[/color]Please report any informational threads on our [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5264513]Weekly Reports[/url] thread to make it easier for journalists to do their jobs.

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/Interview/302.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]Interview[/font][/size][/color] [color=white][size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva]-[/font][/size][/color] [size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774]Bandors[/url][/font][/size][spoiler=][align=left]

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] Bandors, welcome to the weekly news interview. Before we get started, would you like to make any shout outs?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] Yeah, I'd like to give a shout out to Lakai, Bob white, Jex, Economy, and -Nas. Good friends of mine.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] Awesome! May I ask, what brought you to Hack Forums?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] I joined a long time ago. If I believe right, I origionally joined looking for Minecraft Alts and hacking clients. Back in 2012, I remember accounts selling for just a few cents each. I don't think I had anyone invite me, I think I just kind of stumbled upon the forum. I liked it, and decided to build a name for myself.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] As I was browsing your profile, I noticed that you gambled a bit and surprisingly won $16,000. I believe you used some of that money to purchase a group? Tell us a little about that?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] Yeah, I guess that's kind of the buzz around the forum right now. First thing I did when I won was buy a group. I was lucky enough that Omni let me re-make Illuminati. If I remember right, a lot of other people were denied that. So, I feel a little special. I'm going to vegas for the hacking convention Defcon in a couple days. There's going to be a few HF members there, so I'm going to have fun splurging on them. Next, I plan on paying off some deals that fell through and kind of stained my name over the last year. I'll still have a lot of funds left over to really kick off my startup.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] Your start up? I'm assuming you are referring to your newly purchased group, if so, what do you have planned in the future?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] I'm actually talking about www.HackerTeacher.com, I've been working on that  site for about a year now. It's been my pet project, but I plan on really expanding it now. Illuminati is just another new project, I'm hoping I can bring back some of the mystery around it.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser[/b][/color][/url] Ah I see. Do you plan on releasing any products or services under the Illuminati title?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] There's an ungodly amount of stuff I have planned. I have been working on a ton of different unique software to sell. I'm going to keep most of it private for now though, I don't want people copying me until I've released at least :p I'm hoping it will be something cool enough to freshen up the marketplace a little bit.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] It's always nice to see never seen before products added to the Hack Forums marketplace. Do you ever plan on opening a recruitment for Illuminati, or is it going to a invite-only type group?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] I'm probably eventually going to open a general recruitment. I ran Void pretty good when it was in its prime, so I think a lot of things I've learned are going to help me. I'm tired of lame groups, I'm going to try pretty hard to make this group really respected before I start letting in more people.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] How do you plan on making Illuminati unique and stand out from the rest of the groups?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] That's a good question. I plan on only adding people who have solid online earning and are willing to swap and share methods with each other. I want to create a youtube channel for the group that guides noobs through public earning methods, to help rookies earn. There's some other things I am considering, but that's basically what's concreate right now.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] That's a pretty unique idea. When you mean "public earning methods", you mean the methods that have constantly been buzzing around Hack Forums such as CPA, dropshipping, etc..?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] I'm going to try and make it youtube friendly, so probably no blackhat methods or drop shipping. CPA will certainly be covered. I am producing the first video right now, I'm going to explain how people can earn from re-selling social media services. I'm hoping to get out at least one or two videos a week.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] Interesting stuff. What's some advice you would tell upcoming marketers or an individual looking to make money online?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] I'd say, find your niche and stick with it. No one can magically start earning thousands a month. You'll be working some days for pennies on the dollar, and it'll suck. You'll want to start working at burger king, but you just have to be patient. It's easier to start living off the internet if you start in high school. You won't have as many things stopping you.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] Making money off the internet isn't made for every one. It requires a lot of time and dedication to start making money to support yourself and a family , if you had one of course. What's your views on the Hack Forums marketplace?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] It's consistantly evolving. It's in a really weird place right now. There's a lot more people trying to sell things, and I don't believe the amount of buyers has grown. It's a lot harder to start earning from HF today.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] Indeed, that is true. The marketplace contains multiple sellers, but the ratio compared to buyers is horrible. Where would you recommend to start off making money besides Hack Forums?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] All of the videos on the Illuminati Channel will be very easy to use and not require a hackforums account. I think that would be a good place to start once I start publishing. There are also a bunch of guides all over the internet that people could use.

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] Sounds pretty sweet. An Hack Forums member wanted me to ask you this question, " If you could choose to have intercourse with any Hack Forums member, who would it be, and why would it be Orgy? "
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] Haha, I don't think there's anyone in particular I'd like to talk to. I spoke with Orgy earlier today already :) If I had  to choose, I'd probably say Crow, the really old admin. I'd like to talk to him about 2007-2009 HF. Seems like it was a really fun time

[url=http://www.hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1957866][color=#00c5cd][b]Enterpriser:[/b][/color][/url] Aha. Well, that's all the time we have for today, but before I go, what is your honest opinion about Hack Forums and it's community?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1189774][color=white][b]Bandors:[/b][/color][/url] It's going to be interesting to see how things play out now that Omni can't accept Paypal. I'm curious if that's going to slow growth at all. It's a really, really great place to make friends. It's a really fun place to network. If you are an aspiring member, I'd say just focus on becoming friends with the right people.

[/align][/spoiler][/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/ScienceNews.png[/img][/align]

[url=http://www.eurekalert.org/pub_releases/2016-07/wuso-ait072516.php][b][color=white]Preventing the Zika Virus[/color][/b][/url]
Washington University School of Medicine in St. Louis has discovered antibodies to help prevent the spread of the Zika virus. Up until this point, the Zika virus has been spreading rapidly throughout the world and causing fear for any and all pregnant women. While the Zika virus might come along with a nasty fever and other cold-related symptoms, the real fear surrounds potential birth defects that come along with the disease. Luckily, with the identification of these antibodies, comes along the first full proof preventive measure for counteracting and stopping the Zika virus before it can do any lasting damage, however, the discovery of these antibodies didn't provide any insight into the still mysterious disease.

[url=https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2016/07/160728142921.htm][b][color=white]Solar Cell Produces Burnable Fuel on Its Own[/color][/b][/url]
The University of Illinois at Chicago have successfully created a solar cell that produces burnable fuel. While it's true that we've previously used (and continue to do so) solar cells to produce electricity, scientists have never been able to replicate the conversion process in plants that turn the CO2 into a usable fuel, until now. With this new technology not only comes the potential for a revolutionary fuel but, also, the potential to use this conversion process in order to pull CO2 out of the atmosphere effectively killing two problems with one stone. Amin Salehi-Khojin, assistant professor of mechanical and industrial engineering at UIC and senior author on the study says, "Instead of producing energy in an unsustainable one-way route from fossil fuels to greenhouse gas, we can now reverse the process and recycle atmospheric carbon into fuel using sunlight."

[url=https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2016/07/160728125306.htm][b][color=white]Enjoy Your Beer More With Some Tunes[/color][/b][/url]
Dr. Felipe Reinoso Cavalho and his team at Frontiers have found that different sensory information can change the way we experience taste! Collaborating with The Brussels Beer Project, the team first sought out to create their own beer influenced by a selected band. After, the team brought in over 230 beer drinkers to test their new brew. Manipulating the package design and music experienced during the tasting session the researchers wanted to see what effects, if any, manipulating these factors produced. The test was conducted using three groups with different variables; the first group tested the beer with no label or music, the second tasted the beer with manipulated packaging, and the third group tasted the beer with manipulated packaging and a selected song playing in the background. Dr. Felipe Reinoso Cavalho and his team found that those effected by the manipulated packing and music enjoyed the beer, on average, more than the those in the bland control group.

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][img]http://www.hackforums.news/assets/v3/WorldNews.png[/img][/align]

[url=http://www.news.com.au/sport/olympics/rio-2016-olympic-athletes-told-to-keep-your-mouth-closed-when-in-contaminated-water/news-story/45e6ae4643f4dbd4001281f669b898c1][b][color=white]Troubled Waters in Rio[/color][/b][/url]
Rio is having serious troubles with water contamination. Officials are finally recognizing there is an issue, but they have not shown a willingness to allocate funds towards proper sanitation. Since little effort is being made to clean the waters of Guanabara Bay, health experts have told the Olympic athletes to "keep their mouths closed" while in the water. The waters have been found to contain microorganisms, toxins, pathogens, and viruses. Regardless of the findings, events are still scheduled to take place in the contaminated water.

[url=http://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/europe/france-isis-attacks-ban-foreign-financing-mosques-as-prime-minister-warns-of-more-terror-attacks-a7161561.html][b][color=white]France Considers Ban on Foreign-Funding of Mosques[/color][/b][/url]
The French government is expecting more terrorist attacks to occur in the future. In light of these expectations, France is stepping up its effort to produce counter-extremism measures. One measure calls for the country to ban foreign-funding of Mosques. When the Prime Minister was questioned about the policy, he stated very little besides that the ban would take place for an indefinite period of time. France's state of emergency continues after the recent murder of a priest in Normandy by teenage ISIS supporters. 

[url=https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2016/jul/27/leading-insecticide-cuts-bee-sperm-by-almost-40-per-cent-study-shows][b][color=white]Leading Insecticide Affecting Bee Population[/color][/b][/url]
The decline of honey bees has been a concern among the scientific community in recent years. However, the mystery may have finally been solved. Scientists have discovered that a leading insecticide is cutting bee sperm by forty percent, and that a specific type of insecticide is responsible for reducing the lifespan of drones by one-third. The problem with lack of bees has been concentrated in the northern hemisphere. Some countries have issued bans on certain insecticides, but not all countries agree on what should be banned. Bees are vital for pollinating three-quarters of the world's food crops, so this study will prompt further investigation.

[color=transparent]    [/color]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/TechNews/Gladly.png[/img][/align]

[align=left][url=http://tech.firstpost.com/news-analysis/indian-hacker-discovers-vines-source-code-twitter-pays-him-10080-for-his-efforts-326824.html]Hacker Finds Vine's Source Code, Paid $10K[/url]
With bounties for bugs on major websites becoming more prevalent, many individuals have taken it upon themselves to find these bugs and cash in for some serious money. One bug-bounty hunter who goes by Avinash, recently found a major slip up, one that compromised the entire composition of a site. Avinash, using tools to hunt for these bugs, discovered a mistake that made popular six second video sharing site Vine's source code available for the public to put their eyes on. Using public search engine Censys, Avinash was able to find a Docker image for Vine, which happened to contain Vine's source code, libraries, and tools, with all of this information being completely public. Vine's owner, Twitter, fixed the bug within five minutes being reported, and Avinash was only paid about $10,080 for his find.

[url=http://www.pcworld.com/article/3100358/windows/you-cant-turn-off-cortana-in-the-windows-10-anniversary-update.html]Windows 10 Anniversary Update Means You Can't Turn Cortana Off[/url]
With Windows 10 having its one year anniversary very soon, Microsoft plans to roll out an interesting update to mark the occasion. On August 2nd, Windows 10 will receive an update that not only scraps the vanilla search option altogether, but also adds an emphasis on their voice based search tool Cortana, making it always on, with no off switch to be found. Unfortunately, flat-out not downloading the update is not an option, thanks to mandatory Windows 10 updates (at least for Windows 10 Home users). The only way to lessen Cortana's thirst for personal information is to tweak a few settings in your Windows privacy settings, but this will keep Cortana on.

[url=http://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2016/07/amd-radeon-pro-ssg-graphics-card-specs-price-release-date/][b]AMD Reveals Solid State Expandable Graphics Card[/b][/url]
With creative professionals in mind, AMD has released a very different type of graphics card, one that is expandable. Before gamers jump out of their chairs, it is worth mentioning that AMD has aimed this card at creative professionals who need the utmost power for rendering video, meaning the card will be fairly pricey. In fact, the developer kit card is currently priced at upwards of $9,000. What makes the card so expensive is the fact that its memory is expandable, meaning you can add up to 1TB of NAND flash for the best video rendering available. AMD showed off the card by using solid state graphics to scrub through an 8K video on one setup, and a standard graphics card to scrub through the same video. The SSG graphics card beat the standard card by nearly double the FPS, while AMD claimed a higher FPS will be possible. The card will only come in reference card form from AMD, with a whopping ten year warranty.
[/align]

[color=transparent]       [/color]

[align=center][img]http://hackforums.news/assets/v3/GamingNews.png[/img][/align]

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/new-pokemon-sunmoon-trailer-turns-exeggutor-into-a/1100-6442263][color=white]Pokemon Sun & Moon Introduces "Alola Forms"![/color][/url][/b]
Nintendo promised us news regarding the two games slated for a release of November 18 and they delivered! The [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3AZHowhxM0U]trailer[/url] they released revealed brand-new Pokemon as well as new takes on preexisting Pokemon through "Alola Forms". Alola forms provide a new look and type for existing Pokemon. To clarify, Alola is the name of the region that the games will take place. The Pokemon in the region have adapted to the climate and are granted new types! For example, Alola form Ninetales is now a totally beautiful Ice/Fairy type Pokemon. Exeggutor's transformation is most striking. Previously on the plump side, Exeggutor has sprouted a giraffe-like neck and [url=http://cdn.idigitaltimes.com/sites/idigitaltimes.com/files/styles/image_embed/public/2016/08/01/exeggutor-pokemon-sun-moon-alola-form.jpg]appears[/url] to be totally stoked about it! It is now a Grass/Dragon-type, as opposed to a Grass/Psychic-type as in the past. Alola forms increase the possibilities of diverse teams in Pokemon because the variations give rise to new strengths and capabilities in each Pokemon. The video then provides a look at some other new Pokemon, such as Minior, a floating rock that can shed its outer shell, and Gumshoos. A few others were revealed as well. Each of the newly revealed Pokemon posses their own vivid flare and personality. It is hard to not enjoy the trailer! Other new features on display are the ability to ride Pokemon and something called Z-Moves, which are described as a new way to attack enemies. Each type has its own Z-Move, but it can only be used once per battle. Pokemon Sun and Moon are set for release on November 18 on 3DS.

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/life-is-strange-live-action-adaptation-announced/1100-6442193/][color=white]Live-Action Life is Strange Adaption![/color][/url][/b]
A live-action adaptation of Life is Strange, the critically acclaimed episodic game from Dontnod Entertainment, is in production! According to their official Tumblr, it will be a "digital series," which indicates that it will be a television series. Legendary's Cory Lanier will oversee the project with Greg Siegel, senior VP of development of production for the studio. As of now, a writer and director have not been announced and the slots remain open. Legendary stated that it will resume its search and fill the roles "shortly". Life is Strange was a coming of age story that left its players with broken hearts and wet pillowcases. It will be interesting to see how the story is carried over into a live action series. On July 25, Dontnod announced Life is Strange - Episode 1: Chrysalis will be available for free indefinitely. It is the perfect opportunity for gamers to introduce themselves to the wonderful world of Arcadia Bay in preparation for the television series!

[b][url=http://www.gamespot.com/articles/the-new-batman-introduces-multiplayer-to-telltales/1100-6442157/][color=white]Batman Introduces Multiplayer to Telltales[/color][/url][/b]
The game essentially will play just like Telltale's previous games, but now you can allow other gamers to participate in the decision-making aspects of the games! The new feature was revealed by Telltale during San Diego Comic Con. "Now, from two to 2,000-plus people can help the player make decisions," Telltale's communications boss, Job Stauffer, said. "We are now turning all of Telltale's games into a live interactive multiplayer experience". Telltale's Batman will be the first game to use this Crowd Play feature. Turning the feature on will give you a URL that you can share with other people to invite them to your Crowd Play party. Viewers will be able to give each action a thumbs up or down and vote for which dialog that they most want to see chosen. Viewers will be able to see how the vote unfolds, and the game can be set up so that the most popular choice is automatically made or so the player still makes the final choice. This seems like an ideal setup for streamers, but Stauffer noted that latency will most likely be an issue. The game debuts on August 2 for PC, PS4, Xbox One, PS3, and Xbox 360, as well as iOS and Android devices.

[url=http://www.redstate.com/brandon_morse/2016/07/29/north-korea-declares-state-war-us...hahahahahahaha/][b][color=white]North Korea Declares a State of war With the United States[/color][/b][/url]
On July 28, North Korea's top official told The Associated Press that the United States has "crossed the red line". In the past, the United States has sanctioned North Korea as a country; however, this time is a little different - we have declared sanctions on their beloved leader, Kim Jong Un. Once this was released and apparent to the public eye, various Social Media network users have created memes and jokes ridiculing both Kim Jong Un and North Korea as a country. 

[url=http://abc7chicago.com/pets/stray-pit-bull-steps-in-while-woman-was-being-attacked/1451077/][b][color=white]Stray dog Steps in While Woman was Being Attacked[/color][/b][/url]
We all have seen animals come to the rescue in extreme situations, and this situation seems to be one of those. In Knoxville, TN, a stray pit bull intervened a brawl that had a woman being attacked. The dog became very aggressive towards the attacker which led to the pup to being stabbed multiple times. The officers who reported to the call took the dog to the local vet in where surgery was required to keep this good soul alive. Despite almost dying twice during surgery, the pup pushed through and miraculously survived. The officers have named the pit bull "Hero", and the seven-year-old dog is now up for adoption.

[url=http://deadline.com/2016/07/hunger-games-maze-runner-teen-choice-hillary-clinton-1201796288/][b][color=white]Teen Choice Award Winners[/color][/b][/url]
Every year the teens of the world get to voice their opinion every year by voting for their favorite nominee. It is always interesting to see the outlook of the world from a teen's point of view on different categories in pop culture. The Teen Choice Awards had a category for choice of president, and evidently, Hillary Clinton won by a landslide. Pretty Little Liars won the choice of favorite TV show while numerous actors and actresses from the show won awards during the night as well. According to sources, there was over 37 million votes submitted for this award show. If you are interested in viewing the entire list of winners from the award show, click [url=http://deadline.com/2016/07/hunger-games-maze-runner-teen-choice-hillary-clinton-1201796288/]here[/url].
